plugin-list.title: CMI
plugin-list.subtitle: Warps, Homes, & More (Oh My!)
plugin-list.body: CMI is an essential plugin for our server. It adds numerous modern features like a warp GUI, home GUI among numerous other behind the scenes features.

plugin-list.title: McMMO
plugin-list.subtitle: Level Up!
plugin-list.body: McMMO is the most popular and long-standing RPG plugin for Minecraft servers. It adds numerous skill trees & abilities. Visit their wiki for full info as the plugin is always being updated!

plugin-list.title: Jobs
plugin-list.subtitle: Pay me, good sir!
plugin-list.body: Join a job to start earning money for doing normal stuff! You can change at any time and rank up to be able to take more jobs at once. You get paid and you keep the items!

plugin-list.title: Ranks
plugin-list.subtitle: Higher and Higher!
plugin-list.body: Buy ranks with in-game money. No pay to win P2W junk here! Each rank gives different perks. Once you reach the end you can prestige for your pick at an extra special reward!

plugin-list.title: Towny
plugin-list.subtitle: Protect Your Land
plugin-list.body: Griefing isn't allowed, but if you want more control over your land you can start a town. It costs rent every day to keep the town, but The Kingship Act is the buying equivalent to renting a town.

plugin-list.title: CoreProtect
plugin-list.subtitle: Your Blocks are Protected
plugin-list.body: This plugin is more behind the scenes for most, but if you ever get griefed or stolen from it's all logged. Any player can check the logs and let a staff member know if there's been some rule breaking.

plugin-list.title: ChestShop
plugin-list.subtitle: Sell From a Chest
plugin-list.body: Any player can make a chest and put a sign on it to sell stuff to other players. Visit the South Spawn Shopping Square on the server for more information on how to set up a chest shop.

plugin-list.title: Quests
plugin-list.subtitle: Discover Endless Lore
plugin-list.body: We currently have over 100 unique quests and counting. Hundreds of hours of content to explore and earn rewards from! Most quest givers are located around the main spawn area.

plugin-list.title: Minigames
plugin-list.subtitle: Game to Your Heart's Content
plugin-list.body: We have many years of parkours and mazes as well as multiplayer minigames such as spleef. You can earn in-game money by completing all of these minigames!

plugin-list.title: MobArena
plugin-list.subtitle: Multi-round Mob Battle
plugin-list.body: Climb the leaderboard and outlast the mobs in a wave-based arena full of mobs that you can play solo or with a team of people. It is one of the best ways to power level numerous McMMO skills.

plugin-list.title: Voting
plugin-list.subtitle: Vote for the Server & Earn Rewards
plugin-list.body: One of the ways new players find our server is from our server appearing on server lists. By voting for us, you help our server rank higher and have more people see us.

plugin-list.title: CraftBook
plugin-list.subtitle: Amazing Fancy Features
plugin-list.body: This plugin provides numerous small yet cool features. Elevator signs, hidden switches, ammeter, lightstone, painting switcher, xp storer, and many more!

plugin-list.title: Custom Plugins
plugin-list.subtitle: Ooo What Does This Do?
plugin-list.body: We have numerous custom functionality that isn't just a plugin you can download. Our FAQ menu, minigames GUI, bath bomb rewards, boost status, respawn shulkers, dragon drops elytra, and many more!

plugin-list.title: Custom Advancements
plugin-list.subtitle: Track Your Progress!
plugin-list.body: Numerous cool aspects of the server have custom advancements so you can keep track of how far you've come with all of our custom stuff. Voting milestones, old events, etc.
